document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING A ZONING CODE AMENDMENT TO PERMIT LONG TERM CARE FACILITIES IN THE SPECIALTY COMMERICAL ZONING OVERLAY DISTRICT (APN 058-380-007, 058-380-008; 058-380-012, 058-380-015)
